name: Phantom Idol
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, your next draw (the 10th draw) will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 79 draws, your next draw (the 80th draw) will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.
The status for Flat Rates does not apply to other contracts.

The displayed contract rates have been rounded off at the fourth decimal place (to the nearest thousandth), and their combined total may not add up to each rarity-based contract rate or to 100%.
For contracts, the contract rates are based upon each individual draw. Therefore, an item with a contract rate of 1% is not guaranteed to appear within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.

name: Chance Most Wanted Idol Contracts
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws, your next draw (the 10th draw) will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 79 draws, your next draw (the 80th draw) will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.

After you obtain a non-Most Wanted Phantom Thief, if a Phantom Thief of the same rarity appears in the next or subsequent draws, one Most Wanted Phantom Thief will appear.
This Special Most Wanted Draw will be valid until you obtain a Most Wanted Phantom Thief of the same rarity.

<color=#FFFC40>The status for Contract Rates applies to all "chance" contracts, regardless of the event period.</color>

The displayed contract rates have been rounded off at the fourth decimal place (to the nearest thousandth), and their combined total may not add up to each rarity-based contract rate or to 100%.
For contracts, the contract rates are based upon each individual draw. Therefore, an item with a contract rate of 1% is not guaranteed to appear within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.
Please note that as the rates for Most Wanted Phantom Thieves are increased, the rates for other Phantom Thieves are also decreased.

name: Arms Deals
jpTips:
If you didn't obtain a 4★ from the previous 9 draws for these contracts, your next draw (the 10th draw) will have the Flat 1 rate, which guarantees a 4★ or higher.
If you didn't obtain a 5★ from the previous 69 draws, your next draw (the 70th draw) will have the Flat 2 rate, which guarantees a 5★.

After you obtain a non-Most Wanted weapon, if a weapon of the same rarity appears in the next or subsequent draws, one Most Wanted weapon will appear.
This Special Most Wanted Draw will be valid until you obtain a Most Wanted weapon of the same rarity.
The status for Contract Rates applies to all contracts that use the same type of coins, regardless of the event period.

The displayed contract rates have been rounded off at the fourth decimal place (to the nearest thousandth), and their combined total may not add up to each rarity-based contract rate or to 100%.
For contracts, the contract rates are based upon each individual draw. Therefore, an item with a contract rate of 1% is not guaranteed to appear within 100 draws. The same item may also appear more than once.
Some rates have been adjusted to account for Most Wanted contracts.
